EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-05-14 Webinar Invite (5/16).ES-2018-05-14-Webinar-Attendee-Promo1
EmailTemplate.subject: Delivering on the Promise of Application-Aware Infrastructure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Can you imagine if your Application Performance Management solution detected a problem and the infrastructure automatically responded in real-time? If so, you should join ourÂ webinar this Wednesday morning at 11 am EST.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/true-application-aware-infrastructure/]]>
During this live demo, Director of Technical Marketing and Technology Evangelist, Eric Wright will take you through a live tour of Turbonomic 6.1, with a focus on the impact of our deep integration with Gartner APM Magic Quadrant 2018 Leader, Cisco AppDynamics.
I hope you can join us <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/true-application-aware-infrastructure/]]>!
Best, Elizabeth
